CustomField.formula: OR( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EmailTrigger', $Permission.CaseEmailTrigger ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CallSupervisor', $Permission.CaseCallSupervisor ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'TechnicalMonitoring', $Permission.CaseTechnicalMonitoring ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'GoldProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseGoldProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StoreProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseStoreProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CommunityOuvidoriaProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseCommunityOuvidoriaProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'OuvidoriaProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseOuvidoriaProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PlatinumProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CasePlatinumProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PrimeProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CasePrimeProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EscalationAndLawSuits', $Permission.CaseEscalationAndLawSuits ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PurpuraProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CasePurpuraProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ResellerStoreProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseResellerStoreProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SilverProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseSilverProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'VivoVProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseVivoVProcessesEscalation ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'VPRStoreProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseHDEVPRStoreOUT ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'WalletProcessesEscalation', $Permission.CaseWalletProcessesEscalation ) )
CustomField.label: Is visible in list view to current user
